name: Piconjo: AFK
description:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Piconjo: Away From Keyboard

Piconjo grows tired of the shitposting. He's simply too good at it. Opting to spend his time doing something else, he decides to take up fishing. Because if he can be the best at anything he tries, why not something entirely different than he's used to? ...

At least until a certain game drags him back to his Newgrounds shenanigans.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

  • This game is entirely controlled with the mouse and the left mouse button.
  • Left Click on Jetski Pico to activate Rage.
  • Left Click on the Spinning Crab to get a temporary wealth buff.
  • D can be used to see some Debug information.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
